content:
Milan loanee Pepe Reina has revealed that he had symptoms of the Coronavirus and the Aston Villa goalkeeper encouraged people to “follow the restrictions”.
The Spanish shot stopper moved back to the Premier League in January, when the Villains picked him up … [+955 chars]
